name: Temple Guardians
description:
[[THIS IS A PROTOTYPE]]

Help Lilla, a young explorer lost in an old ruin. Discover incredible things long forgotten.

[[Intructions]]

WASD - To move the character
Space Bar - Interacts with robots
Q - To use the skills of the robot.

Developers :

Code : David Thiago G. - https://davidtg98.itch.io/ 

Art : Renato Ferreira G. - https://renatosladee.itch.io/   & Lincoln C. - https://yukyopus.itch.io/
